trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> column that hosts textual content in its cells.
Use <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn> to display columns of data as text.
The following illustration shows an example of two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn> types.
![Two DataGridTextColumns](~/add/media/wpf-datagridtextcolumns.png "Two DataGridTextColumns")
To create a column, add it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection.
To populate the column, bind the column to the data by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A> property.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A> property is applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> element created in the column.
The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> for the element in each cell is the data item for the row the cell is in.
Therefore, to set up the binding you only have to set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Optionally, you can specify a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> if you want to convert the data or the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.StringFormat%2A>.
For more information about data binding, see [Data Binding (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf.md).

**Note** <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn> creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> element in the non-editing mode and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> element in the editing mode.

You can customize the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn> by setting properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn.FontSize%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly%2A>.
If you want to display other types of data, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> provides the following column types:
Column Type
Data Display
Use to display URI data.
Use to display enumeration data.
Use to display Boolean data.
If you want to use other controls in your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>, you can create your own column types by using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn"></xref> class.
Causes the column cell being edited to revert to the specified value.
The element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.
The previous, unedited value in the cell being edited.
Performs any required validation before exiting the edit mode.
The element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.
`false` if validation fails; otherwise, `true`.
The default value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.EditingElementStyle"></xref> property.
An object that represents the style.
The default value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.ElementStyle"></xref> property.
An object that represents the style.
Gets or sets the font family for the content of cells in the column.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn.FontFamily%2A> property determines the font for controls in the column only when the template uses the property as a parameter.
The font family of the content for cells in the column.
The registered default is <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily"></xref>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn.FontFamily"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the font size for the content of cells in the column.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn.FontSize%2A> property determines the font size for controls in the column only when the template uses the property as a parameter.
The font size of the content of cells in the column.
The registered default is <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize"></xref>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn.FontSize"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the font style for the content of cells in the column.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn.FontStyle%2A> property determines the font style for controls in the column only when the template uses the property as a parameter.
The font style of the content of cells in the column.
The registered default is <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontStyle"></xref>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn.FontStyle"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the font weight for the content of cells in the column.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn.FontWeight%2A> property determines the font weight for controls in the column only when the template uses the property as a parameter.
The font weight of the contents of cells in the column.
The registered default is <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontWeight"></xref>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn.FontWeight"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that is used to paint the text contents of cells in the column.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn.Foreground%2A> property determines the brush for the text contents of controls in the column only when the template uses the property as a parameter.
The brush that is used to paint the contents of cells in the column.
The registered default is <xref href="System.Windows.SystemColors.ControlTextBrush"></xref>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn.Foreground"></xref> dependency property.
Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> control that is bound to the column's <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding"></xref> property value.
The cell that will contain the generated element.
The data item represented by the row that contains the intended cell.
A new text box control that is bound to the column's <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding"></xref> property value.
Gets a read-only <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock"></xref> control that is bound to the column's <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding"></xref> property value.
The cell that will contain the generated element.
The data item represented by the row that contains the intended cell.
A new, read-only text block control that is bound to the column's <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding"></xref> property value.
Called when a cell in the column enters editing mode.
The element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.
Information about the user gesture that is causing a cell to enter editing mode.
The unedited value of the cell.
Refreshes the contents of a cell in the column in response to a column property value change.
The cell to update.
The name of the column property that has changed.
